isis.stitle: TSI 00-12-04 - Performance Specifications for Model Year 2000 and 2001 International® T 444E Engine Applications

subjectgroup.subject: Performance Specifications for Model Year 2000 and 2001 International® T 444E Engine Applications

geninfo.para:
Engine Performance Specifications for International T 444E Engine Applications are released for service. The 2000 emission label
and the 2001 emission label
on engine identifies Engine Model Year and Horsepower Rating.

figure.caption: Figure 1. 2000 MY International T 444E Emission Label

calloutgroup.callout1: 3. Be Sure To Properly Identify The Engine

figure.caption: Figure 2. 2001 MY International T 444E Emission Label

calloutgroup.callout1: 3. Be Sure To Properly Identify The Engine
